Piercer

two handed weapon (lvl 2)

item id [id]: 67

damage [dmg]: 12
range [range]: 35
precision [prec]: +10
nbr of attacks [nratt]: -2
ammunition [ammo]: 12
(can-be-used-underwater [uwok])
 
(Requires Two Hands [twohanded], Armor Negating [armornegating], May Use Underwater [uwok], Piercing Damage [pierce], Magic weapon [magic], Strength not added to damage [nostr])

Requires 5E5A to forge (E1A1)

Bolts fired from this crossbow are extremely sharp and will go straight through any shields or armor in their path. The Piercer can also be used underwater.
